casebody.data:
Rolando ROBLES
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 15, 2017

Naomi T. Fetterman, in support of the petition.

Lisa A. Riggione, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Rolando Robles' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 751, 153 A.3d 29 (2016), is denied.
